<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List Agents"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/agents"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves a list of all agents in the system.

Returns an empty list if no agents exist.
Agents are returned in no guaranteed order.

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"List of all agents in the system","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"properties":{"data":{"items":{"properties":{"id":{"type":"string","maxLength":10,"minLength":10,"title":"Id","description":"Unique identifier for the agent","examples":["vUfk4PgjTm"]},"name":{"type":"string","maxLength":100,"minLength":1,"title":"Name","description":"The display name of the agent, mainly for representation purposes","examples":["Drizzle","Smarty"]},"type":{"type":"string","maxLength":100,"minLength":1,"title":"Type","description":"The type of the agent","examples":["weather"]},"description":{"anyOf":[{"type":"string","description":"Detailed of the agent's purpose and capabilities","examples":["An agent that checks the weather"]},{"type":"null"}],"title":"Description"},"created_at":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","title":"Created At","description":"When the agent was created","examples":["2025-01-21T23:44:48"]}},"additionalProperties":false,"type":"object","required":["id","name","type","created_at"],"title":"Agent","example":{"created_at":"2025-01-21T23:44:48","description":"An agent that checks the weather","id":"vUfk4PgjTm","name":"Drizzle","type":"weather"}},"type":"array","title":"Data"}},"additionalProperties":false,"type":"object","required":["data"],"title":"Agents","example":{"data":[{"created_at":"2025-01-21T23:44:48","description":"An agent that checks the weather","id":"vUfk4PgjTm","name":"Drizzle","type":"weather"}]}},"example":{"data":[{"id":"vUfk4PgjTm","name":"Drizzle","type":"weather","description":"An agent that checks the weather","created_at":"2025-01-21T23:44:48"}]}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
